item.title: Comil versatile 2008 v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

Comil versatile 2008 v1.0 ETS2

The Comil Versatile 2008 is a popular bus model, and while it’s not a standard vehicle in **Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2)**, it is a well-known subject for modders. Bus mods, particularly of Brazilian models like the Comil, are very common in the ETS2 community.

To drive a Comil Versatile 2008 in ETS2, you’ll need to find and install a mod created by a third-party developer. These mods are available on various modding websites and often include:
Custom 3D models of the bus, both for the exterior and interior.
Realistic sounds for the engine, air brakes, and other systems.
Chassis options to simulate different real-world configurations, like those from Mercedes-Benz or Volkswagen.
Custom skins and paint jobs, often representing real Brazilian bus companies.

Where to Find Bus Mods for ETS2
The best places to look for a Comil Versatile 2008 mod would be:
Modding websites and forums: Many websites specialize in mods for ETS2 and other truck simulators. A simple search for “Comil Versatile 2008 ETS2 mod” will likely bring up several results.
YouTube: Many mod creators showcase their work on YouTube and provide download links in the video descriptions. This is a great way to see the mod in action before you download it.
Steam Workshop: While some bus mods are available on the Steam Workshop, the selection can be more limited compared to dedicated modding sites, and many high-quality, specialized bus mods are hosted elsewhere.

When you download and install a mod, remember to check its compatibility with your current game version of ETS2, as outdated mods can sometimes cause crashes or other issues. You will also need to have the game’s Mod Manager enabled to activate the bus.

Happy driving!

Credits: cordeiro

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: ScaniaR LG.Mods v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

ScaniaR LG.Mods v1.0 ETS2

ScaniaR: This is a reference to the Scania R-series truck, which is a popular model from the Swedish manufacturer, Scania. The “R” series is known for its comfort, performance, and distinctive design, making it a favorite for long-haul drivers.
LG.Mods: This is the name of the content creator or modding team responsible for developing the mod. Modders like LG.Mods create custom content, often focused on specific regions or styles, to enhance the gameplay experience for others. Their mods are often highly detailed and feature unique options.
Mods from creators like LG.Mods are very popular in the Brazilian ETS2 community, as they often include features and customizations that are specific to Brazilian trucks and trucking culture. This could include things like:
Custom chassis and engine options to reflect real-world configurations.
Unique tuning parts and accessories.
Realistic cabin interiors and sounds.
Custom paint jobs and decals inspired by Brazilian trucking companies.

Credits: LG

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

item.title: RBR CEGONHA TRES EIXOS v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

RBR CEGONHA TRES EIXOS v1.0 ETS2

RBR: This is likely an acronym for a modding team or a project, commonly “Rotas Brasil,” which is a well-known name associated with Brazilian-themed maps and content for ETS2.
CEGONHA: This is the Portuguese word for “stork” and is the common term for a car carrier trailer, the kind of trailer that transports multiple cars at once.
TRES EIXOS: This means “three axles,” referring to the trailer’s configuration.
In simple terms, you’re looking for a three-axle car carrier trailer mod for ETS2, likely made by the “Rotas Brasil” team or a modder associated with them.

Credits: rbr

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.

item.title: Marcopolo Viaggio GV 1000 Mercedes Benz v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 10, 2025

Marcopolo Viaggio GV 1000 Mercedes Benz v1.0 ETS2

The Marcopolo Viaggio GV 1000 is a classic bus model from the renowned Brazilian manufacturer Marcopolo. The “GV” in its name stands for “Geração V” or “Generation V,” indicating it was part of their fifth generation of buses. While the Viaggio GV 1000 was available with chassis from various manufacturers, it’s pairing with a **Mercedes-Benz** chassis was a popular choice.

Key Characteristics of the Viaggio GV 1000
The Marcopolo Viaggio GV 1000, produced from the late 1980s to the early 2000s, was known for its robust and timeless design. It was widely used for medium to long-distance transportation.

Some of its notable features include:
Design: The GV series introduced a more aerodynamic and modern look compared to its predecessors, featuring a distinctive rounded front and rear.
Interior: The interior was designed for passenger comfort, often featuring reclining seats, overhead luggage racks, and individual reading lights.
Versatility: It was configured with or without amenities like air conditioning and restrooms, making it suitable for a variety of services, from basic charter trips to more comfortable intercity travel.

Common Mercedes-Benz Chassis for the Viaggio GV 1000
Marcopolo often built its bodies on different chassis to meet specific customer needs. The Mercedes-Benz chassis were particularly well-regarded for their durability and reliable performance. Some of the common Mercedes-Benz chassis used for the Viaggio GV 1000 include:
Mercedes-Benz OH-1621: A popular rear-engine chassis known for its reliability, which was often paired with the GV 1000 for a variety of uses.
Mercedes-Benz O-400 RSE: This chassis, often used in the mid-1990s, was a more powerful option with an air suspension system, providing a smoother ride for passengers. It was equipped with a robust engine like the **OM 457**, a 6-cylinder diesel engine with a turbo and intercooler, delivering significant horsepower.
Mercedes-Benz OF-1721: This was a front-engine chassis, making it a more economical option, often used for shorter-distance routes or shuttle services.
This combination of a classic Marcopolo body and a reliable Mercedes-Benz chassis made the Viaggio GV 1000 a staple in many fleets and a memorable sight on the roads of Brazil and other countries.

Credits: impera mods

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.
